ch.aplu.android

Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.android.Actor
      • ch.aplu.android.Turtle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GGActorCollisionListener, GGBorderListener, GGTileCollisionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Turtle
extends Actor
    A class that implements the basic behavior of a Logo turtle. As Turtle is derived from Actor, all (non-private) methods of Actor are available. Thus more turtle methods may be added by deriving this class and using methods from the class Actor.

    Turtles lives in a TurtlePane playground that derives from GameGrid. Turtle coordinates are integers in the range 0..300.

    All drawing methods call GameGrid.refresh() to repaint the window automatically even when the simulation cycling is not started.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Turtle

        public Turtle()
        Creates a turtle using the sprite image 'turtle'. The image file turtle.png, turtle.gif or turtle.jpg must be provided in the res/drawable folder.
